item.title: Azure DevOps Web App CI/CD
item.description: React Web App Release: Startup command 1pm2 serve /home/site/wwwroot/ --no-daemon --spa References https://git-scm.com/docs/git-mv https://www.runoob.com/git/git-mv.html

item.title: React Learning
item.description: Create React App Create React App 1npx create-react-app my-app 1cd my-app 2npm start # or 'yarn start' Modules Webpack: JavaScript bundler Babel: JavaScript complier ES Lint | extension: JavaScript linter Jest: JavaScript test framework Web Vitals: measuring performance, accessibility and best practice Project Structure 1-.github 2-node_modules 3-public: has files that Webpack will manage and will also be moved to server when publish 4-- index.html: the entry point for the browsers. Webpack use this file to inject JavaScript code you write as well as React code and other CSS.
